name: Leatherman Raptor Shears with Molle Holster
description: A tough set of folding shears for those who hold lives in their hands. These shears will be right at home in your first aid kit, emergency kit or on a duty belt.Rigid Molle holster will hold the shears either open or closed, adapting to your situation and need.Carbide glass-breaking tip shatters glass with minimal effort.Includes oxygen-tank wrench.Ring cutter is specifically designed to shear rings made of soft metal, such as silver or gold.Strap cutter allows for easy slicing of straps with minimal risk to patients.
